entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Local smoke. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
